code:
from numbers import Number

gyro_z = None


gyro_z = 0
while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  gyro_z = (gyro_z if isinstance(gyro_z, Number) else 0) + get_bot().get_mpu_gyro(2) / 10
  get_cam().set_text(gyro_z)
  if gyro_z < 90:
    get_bot().left(speed=100, elapse=0.01)
  else:
    get_bot().stop()
